alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:58PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Northampton, southeastern Mecklenburg and southern Brunswick Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 258 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near La Crosse, or near South Hill, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... La Crosse around 305 PM EDT. Brodnax and Ebony around 315 PM EDT. Brunswick around 335 PM EDT. Lawrenceville around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Beechwood, Triplet, Bowens Corner, Henrico, White Plains, Vultare, Valentines, Meredithville, Forksville and Bracey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina...and south central and southeastern Virginia.
